Package it.unipi.hadoop

Class KMeansUtil

java.lang.Object
it.unipi.hadoop.KMeansUtil
public class KMeansUtil extends Object
Utility class for the KMeans algorithm. Provides various helper methods for reading centroids, configuring jobs, calculating centroid shifts, etc.

    • readCentroidFromMultipleFiles

      public static ArrayList<Centroid> readCentroidFromMultipleFiles(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dirPath) throws IOException
      Reads centroids from multiple files in a directory.
      Parameters:
      conf - The Hadoop configuration.
      dirPath - The directory path containing the centroid files.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Centroid objects read from the files.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file reading.

    • readCentroids

      public static ArrayList<Centroid> readCentroids(String pathString, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, boolean csvReading) throws IOException
      Reads centroids from a file.
      Parameters:
      pathString - The path to the file that contains the centroids.
      conf - The Hadoop configuration.
      csvReading - Flag indicating whether the file is in CSV format.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Centroid objects read from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file reading.

    • configureJob

      public static org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job configureJob(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path inputPath, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath, int numReducers, int iteration)
      Configures a MapReduce job for K-Means iteration.
      Parameters:
      conf - The Hadoop configuration.
      inputPath - The input path for the MapReduce job.
      outputPath - The output path for the MapReduce job.
      numReducers - The number of reducers for the MapReduce job.
      iteration - The current iteration number.
      Returns:
      The configured MapReduce job.

    • readCentroidsFromConfiguration

      public static ArrayList<Centroid> readCentroidsFromConfiguration(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Reads centroids from the Hadoop configuration.
      Parameters:
      conf - The Hadoop configuration.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Centroid objects read from the configuration.

    • calculateCentroidShift

      public static double calculateCentroidShift(ArrayList<Centroid> currentCentroids, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Calculates the shift of centroids between current and previous iterations.
      Parameters:
      currentCentroids - The centroids of the current iteration.
      conf - The Hadoop configuration.
      Returns:
      The calculated centroid shift.

    • setCentroidsToConf

      public static void setCentroidsToConf(String key, ArrayList<Centroid> centroids, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Sets the centroids to the Hadoop configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for storing the centroids in the configuration.
      centroids - The centroids to be set in the configuration.
      conf - The Hadoop configuration.

    • logIterationInfo

      public static void logIterationInfo(int iteration, double shift, int numReducers)
      Logs iteration information to a log file.
      Parameters:
      iteration - The current iteration number.
      shift - The centroid shift value.
      numReducers - The number of reducers used in the iteration.
